explains: adv. 貌似，看似（但可能并非如此）；似乎，好像（是事实）

sentences.en: She was rich, beautiful and seemingly ageless.
sentences.cn: 她富有漂亮，而且看起来永不显老。

sentences.en: A seemingly endless line of trucks waits in vain to load up.
sentences.cn: 看上去没有尽头的一排卡车徒劳地等着装货。

sentences.en: Doug lived in the shadow of his seemingly omnipotent father.
sentences.cn: 道格生活在他那看似无所不能的父亲的阴影里。
